id-18191.title: Plant Shop
id-18191.post-content:
The Plant Shop template has an authentic feel reminiscent of a nursery, florist or store that sells plants. The homepage opens with a large image of a houseplant, with a simple headline and call to action.

The rest of the page showcases your products using calm colors, a simple layout and lots of images to show as well as tell. It’s an effective store template that integrates with WooCommerce to deliver an easy to use store that actively encourages people to browse and buy.

Key features of the Plant Shop template

  • Attractive eCommerce store template for plants
  • Modern design with plenty of customization options
  • Effective product and category listing sections
  • Conversion-oriented product pages
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-18191.post-excerpt: Conversion-oriented eCommerce template for plant stores and nursery businesses

id-46009.title: Painter
id-46009.post-content:
The Painter template is a bright, engaging design that opens with a large header, handwritten and modern fonts and lots of bright images. It’s a very creative web template that fits the artist and painter niche perfectly.

The template includes alternating colored and light backgrounds with textured images, bright contrast colors and flowing layout. Complementary pages all reflect the core design, with different colors to indicate different purposes while looking and feeling similar.

Key features of the Painter template

  • Bright, colorful design perfect for painters and artists
  • Flowing layout that encourages you to explore
  • Strong images to help showcase your work
  • Extra pages including a portfolio
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-46009.post-excerpt: Colorful website template for artists, creatives and painters to show their work

id-19540.title: Yoga Instructor
id-19540.post-content:
The Yoga Instructor template is a light, accessible design with a relaxed feel ideal for the wellness niche. It has a light fullscreen image with a yoga pose and engaging headline text. The rest of the design uses plenty of whitespace and a nice pink contrast color.

The page uses lovely graphics to showcase services and includes flexible content areas where you can share your passion and engage your audience with storytelling. All backed up by subtle calls to action and an attractive contact page.

Key features of the Yoga Instructor template

  • Relaxed design that works for the yoga niche
  • Light layout with plenty of whitespace
  • Flexible content areas
  • Contact form included with the template
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-19540.post-excerpt: Relaxed web template ideal for yoga instructors and wellness business owners

id-39906.title: Church
id-39906.post-content:
The Church website template has a serene feel while portraying the seriousness of the subject in a welcoming manner. The template opens with a full screen image and strong headlines and call to action.

The rest of the theme has a lighter feel and more open layout with images, content areas, offset sections and feature spaces. The extra pages are all relevant to the niche and provide lots of opportunities to continue spreading the good word.

Key features of the Church template

  • Serene design with lots of modern touches
  • Offset layout creates engagement and feels open
  • Lots of content areas for spreading the word
  • Extra pages relevant to the niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-39906.post-excerpt: Welcoming church web template that’s open and inclusive to help spread the word

id-45643.title: Cosmetics Store
id-45643.post-content:
The Cosmetics Store template is ideal for eCommerce websites. It has an engaging full screen image where you can showcase your latest products and minimalist store areas further down the page along with featured products and promotion areas.

This is a minimal design with some powerful features, modern fonts, some nice images and graphical touches, minimal navigation with shopping cart and category pages. Everything you need to launch your online store!

Key features of the Cosmetics Store template

  • Minimalist eCommerce template with some nice touches
  • Great use of images and fonts
  • Borderless content areas keep the flow
  • Category and product pages included
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-45643.post-excerpt: Minimalist eCommerce template that could be used for any type of online store

id-45577.title: Wedding Invitation
id-45577.post-content:
The Wedding Invitation template is a romantic one-page design with a modern twist. It opens with an inset video of the happy couple before unfolding to outline the what, where and when of the wedding.

Even though it’s a one-page web template with a limited goal, the design makes it seem so much more. The combination of flower graphics, fonts and colors help create that happy feeling you want to invoke for a wedding.

Key features of the Wedding Invitation template

  • Romantic one-page template with genuine appeal
  • Inset video can showcase the happy couple or venue
  • Great mix of colors, graphics and fonts
  • Can be fully customized in every way possible
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-45577.post-excerpt: Romantic one-page wedding invitation template for happy couples and wedding planners

id-38787.title: Law Firm
id-38787.post-content:
The Law Firm template is a corporate-style design with the gravity and authority you would expect from the niche. It still remains welcoming and accessible, but combines the atmosphere you would expect from the law.

The design uses fullscreen header with simple navigation and a calm contrast color for calls to action. The rest of the template has a light feel with lots of content areas to share your services, expertise, testimonials and to tell your story.

Key features of the Law Firm template

  • Welcoming with the gravity expected of a law firm
  • Calm contrast color works very well
  • Lots of content areas for services and expertise
  • Supplementary pages ideal for the niche
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-38787.post-excerpt: Corporate web design ideal for law firms and lawyers wanting to build authority

id-38757.title: Nutritionist
id-38757.post-content:
The Nutritionist template is a creative business template that could be customized to suit any niche, including this one. With an open design and a combination of light and dark areas, borderless content areas and that green contrast color, it’s a real winner.

The homepage is effective, with a call to action in the header, lots of content areas to showcase products and services, share class schedules, offer videos and downloads and feature your latest blog posts.

Key features of the Nutritionist template

  • Modern business website template ideal for a range of niches
  • Strong header with image and calls to action
  • Borderless content area provides an open feel
  • Lots of opportunities to customize to your specific needs
  • Full compatibility with leading page builders
id-38757.post-excerpt: Well-designed web template for nutritionists that could be tweaked to any use
